post.text: There's a reason why people question the TRUSTWORTHINESS of Hillary Clinton and that's because they're paying attention! CROOKED Hillary is shady!

comment.author: Summer
comment.text: You both need to start coming at her hard on the emails, Benghazi, and so many more topics! Y'all are being too easy on her!

replies.author: Evan
replies.text: Funny how EVERY time the 30,000 deleted emails was brought up by Mike Pence that the moderator said "You have 30 seconds" and shut Pence up. Hmmmm... Makes me wonder even more what is in those emails. Come on Wikileaks the American people are waiting!

replies.author: Anna
replies.text: I noticed that, as well Evan! I agree 100%

replies.author: Matthew
replies.text: Don't worry Trump pence learned a lot from these debates, hillary and caine showed their hands and their mo ...they have nothing left, while trump studied them.

replies.author: Andrew
replies.text: I beleive wiki leaks just made another announcement..."Guns for ISIS" sold by Hillary.....our October present arrived...haha
